title: Pick'Em Mission
body: Hello, with the victory of SKT i reached 37 points, but I didn't receive the cute icon yet. Is it normal or is this a problem? I also am 1 mission away to getting the worlds orb so i can't wait!

replies.body: We've seen some reports of this, and it looks like it might just be a delay.  If you haven't gotten it after a day, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take a look to investigate and get that settled for you.
I got 43 points right now and it doesn't say that I completed the mission so I have the same problem!
